title: Vu taric and rework
body: when this come to happen more love to taric {{champion:44}}  been so long he need Vu :( and some awesome skin

replies.body:
The VU is currently in progress. :] 

As RiotRepertior had [mentioned](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/EABt8X1q-riotrepertoir-how-is-taric-and-the-rest-coming-along?comment=0000) - 

*Taric's 90% or so done from the gameplay side actually. However, due to him needing new model, animations, vfx, sfx, etc., there are still a few big projects ahead of him. It probably won't be until late fall or winter that we reveal changes.*

Once his VU is complete, we can look into giving Taric a new look in regards to skins!
Does it mean that the concepts are ready but need to be actually made or that the only thing that is ready is the kit part and you are still working on the visual concept and on vfx,sfx, etc?

> [{quoted}](name=Stars Shaper,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=03zLUp0V,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-27T18:12:56.954+0000)
>
> Does it mean that the concepts are ready but need to be actually made or that the only thing that is ready is the kit part and you are still working on the visual concept and on vfx,sfx, etc?

Not totally sure - I just know it's a work in progress. (I'm on skins, so I'm not totally up to date with what's happening with VUs, etc., as another team handles them.)
ok, thanks for the infos anyway^^
Hi, could you please check out my thread about him? I'm just curious if you actually like it.
How much do they plan on reworking for him? Becasue righ tnow he is my main support. I really own bot lane using him.
